args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Team DLCC
email: staff@dlcc.org
subject: asking directly
body: Your $7 donation could be the difference between electing state Democrats who fight to protect abortion rights or losing to one of our far-right Republican opponents. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- We have one question: Is defeating extreme Republicans across the country worth $7 to you? At the state legislative ballot level, races come down to a handful of votes, and resources are limited. A 5X-matched gift of $7 could give our in-state partners the necessary resources to fund get-out-the-vote efforts, hire digital staff, and invest in TV ads to spread our message across the airwaves. **Your 5X-matched $7 donation could be the difference between electing state Democrats who will fight to protect abortion rights or losing to one of our far-right Republican opponents who aim to attack all of our fundamental freedoms.** Before our match extension ends, we’re asking you directly. Is seeing Democrats win next week and defeating MAGA Republicans worth $7 to you? If it is, own a piece of this fight by chipping in now. We’re working to expand Democratic power, defend our majorities, and break up Republican supermajorities this fall – but it all starts with a donation from grassroots supporters like you. If you step up and decide $7 is worth investing before our deadline, you can feel good knowing that you helped Democrats gain power in states nationwide. We’re asking again: Will you donate a 5X-matched gift of $7 to help state Democrats defeat extreme Republicans in this election and beyond? | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  Thank you so much,Team DLCC  **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. Notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee is dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. This message was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com because you are a part of our grassroots network.  Emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our supporters. Please add usto your address book or safe senders list to ensure timely election updates.  We're fighting to elect Democrats and advance a progressive vision in thestates. Our success depends on grassroots donors like you. Ninety-eightpercent of our donors give less than $200, and two-thirds give less than $20.To make a contribution, please click here. To unsubscribe and stop receivingemails about our efforts, please click here. ---  | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, please click here.  ---  ![](https://an.dlcc.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b4/G6tcPgcmRiWN0OjcS-ZmXQ/ho.gif)
